text: The 1957 Volta a Catalunya was the 37th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 1 September to 8 September 1957. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Jesús Loroño. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 41" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 33" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 00" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 4' 29" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 42" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 52" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 47" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 13' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 14' 35" |} |} ==References== 1957 Volta Category:1957 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1957 sports events
